Name: Scaper Dash
About the game: Scaper Dash is a casual indie puzzle game with many different levels. Your task is to deliver your main character (the yellow figure) to the exit. Also, in addition to the main character, you can control many other objects.
Meta Title: Scaper Dash: May 12, 2021, OneRoad Studios and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Scaper Dash? Check out the release date (May 12, 2021), developer insights from OneRoad Studios, and a complete game summary.
